title: Hextech Key Drop Rate
body: so i was wondering what the drop rate is for keys and how much it gets reduced by after getting a key fragment. anyone know?

replies.body: Droprates refresh about every 28 days, and start at an increased rate and gradually decline as you get more.  More details are also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear thing up, and good luck!
